sophisticated analytical framework with a 31-day event window and a 150-day estimation window, enabling the disentanglement of firm-specific abnormal returns from systemic market influences• Employed advanced statistical tools, including hypothesis testing (t-tests), to assess deviations from the semi-strong form of the Efficient Market Hypothesis and to explore temporal anomalies in pre- and post-event market adjustments• Conducted an in-depth investigation into investor sentiment dynamics and information assimilation processes, contributing to the theoretical establishment of behavioral
